original_text: And the messenger answered and said, Israel is fled before the Philistines, and there hath been also a great slaughter among the people, and thy two sons also, Hophni and Phinehas, are dead, and the ark of God is taken.
korean_text: 소식을 전하는 자가 대답하여 이르되 이스라엘이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하였고 백성 중에는 큰 살륙이 있었고 당신의 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스도 죽임을 당하였고 하나님의 궤는 빼앗겼나이다

sentences.original_text: And the messenger answered and said
Israel is fled before the Philistines
and there hath been also a great slaughter among the people
and thy two sons also, Hophni and Phinehas, are dead
and the ark of God is taken
